comments.body: Added the zip file with the project source code.

comments.body:

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Committed the contributed sources to contrib/jackrabbit-jcr-import-export-tool in revision 540416. Thanks!

I'd like to see the tool included in Jackrabbit 1.4, so I'll probably follow up later on with a separate issue to upgrade the tool from contrib.

description: We at <GX> creative online development would like to contribute our command-line import-export tool to the Apache Jackrabbit project. This tool is capable of exporting and importing all kinds of repository content (including custom nodetypes and namespace mappings) in a persistence-layer independent way.
